column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I haven't been to too many Ramen places but I'd say from the places I've been to
column2: Jinya's pork chashu has been phenomenal. Melts in your mouth. Also my first time trying takoyaki but it was also really good
column3: a little smaller though than the ones from that Anthony Bourdain episode but at least you get like 5 of them. Atmospheres cool and the hours are good. Â Pork gyoza is average though but you get 8 of them so you can't go wrong if you're with a group. Great place
